room_title: Escape room "The Stolen Diamond" by Portsmouth Team Building - Escape Rooms in Portsmouth
room_description:
One of our Safari guides, Bob, stole the famous Cullinan diamond from Africa. He secretly hid it our office to protect its whereabouts. After his return to Africa last week, he was apprehended and is being held captive by local authorities. Bob is available via our Satellite TV and needs your help to locate the Cullinan Diamond. The Cullinan diamond was discovered in 1905 and is the second largest diamond ever found in history. This diamond is 530.2 carats in size. 
See if your team has what it needs to grab a rare glimpse of this amazing historical gem and help save Bob.
